argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ringcbas.c | |- C = ( RingCat ` U ) |
| 2 |  | ringcbas.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 3 |  | ringcbas.u | |- ( ph -> U e. V ) |
| 4 |  | ringchomfval.h | |- H = ( Hom ` C ) |
| 5 |  | ringchom.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | ringchom.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_ringchom | |- ( ph -> ( X H Y ) = ( X RingHom Y ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( X H Y ) <-> F e. ( X RingHom Y ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` X ) = ( Base ` X ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` Y ) = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_rhmf | |- ( F e. ( X RingHom Y ) -> F : ( Base ` X ) --> ( Base ` Y ) ) |
| 12 | 8, 11 | #P_syl6bi | |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( X H Y ) -> F : ( Base ` X ) --> ( Base ` Y ) ) ) |
